mapper.select: select l.id as id , l.title as title, l.dscp as dscp , l.userid as userid , l.categoryname as categoryname, l.rtmpurl as rtmpurl, l.status as status, l.seriescode as seriescode , u.username as username from liveroom l left join user u on l.userid=u.id order by l.status DESC

select l.id as id , l.title as title, l.dscp as dscp , l.userid as userid , l.categoryname as categoryname, l.rtmpurl as rtmpurl, l.status as status, l.seriescode as seriescode , u.username as username from liveroom l left join user u on l.userid=u.id where u.username like CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or l.title like CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or l.categoryname like CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') order by l.status DESC

select l.id as id , l.title as title, l.dscp as dscp , l.userid as userid , l.categoryname as categoryname, l.rtmpurl as rtmpurl, l.status as status, l.seriescode as seriescode , u.username as username from liveroom l left join user u on l.userid=u.id where l.id = #{roomId} order by l.status DESC

select l.id as id , l.title as title, l.dscp as dscp , l.userid as userid , l.categoryname as categoryname, l.rtmpurl as rtmpurl, l.status as status, l.seriescode as seriescode , u.username as username from liveroom l left join user u on l.userid=u.id where l.categoryname =#{type} order by l.status DESC

select l.id as id , l.title as title, l.dscp as dscp , l.userid as userid , l.categoryname as categoryname, l.rtmpurl as rtmpurl, l.status as status, l.seriescode as seriescode , u.username as username from liveroom l left join user u on l.userid=u.id where l.categoryname =#{type} order by l.status DESC limit 0,#{num}

select l.id as id , l.title as title, l.dscp as dscp , l.userid as userid , l.categoryname as categoryname, l.rtmpurl as rtmpurl, l.status as status, l.seriescode as seriescode , u.username as username from liveroom l left join user u on l.userid=u.id where l.status = 1 order by l.id asc limit 0,5
